abstract: While more votes have been cast in favor of Michael S. Dell and Silver Lake’s takeover proposal, the tally is not enough to win without a change in rules.
snippet: While more votes have been cast in favor of Michael S. Dell and Silver Lake’s takeover proposal, the tally is not enough to win without a change in rules.
lead_paragraph: A seemingly small concession during the original negotiations over the proposed takeover of Dell by the company’s founder has come into focus in the increasingly protracted deal saga.

headline.main: Voting Rule Change Is Seen as Crucial to Dell Founder’s Takeover Bid
headline.print_headline: Voting Rule Change Is Viewed as Crucial to Dell Founder’s Takeover Bid

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
